name: Ronson Universal Gas Lighter Refill 200Ml
description: ULTRA REFINED FOR MAXIMUM CARE AND PERFORMANCE.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE.Butane - Extremely Flammable.FLAMMABLE GAS 2.AEROSOL - containing flammable gas.Pressurised container: Do not pierce or burn, even after use.  Do not spray on a naked flame or any incandescent material.  Take precautionary measures against static discharges.  WARNING: Read label before use, Use only as directed,  Deliberate inhaling of contents may be harmful or even fatal.  If medical advice is needed have this container to hand.  Filling Instructions: If required, select appropriate adaptor and fit to valve stem (Most lighters do not require an adaptor).  Invert can and press firmly into the lighter filler valve.  Fill to the lighter manufacturer's instructions.  Stop filling operation if any spillage occurs and allow plenty of time for the split liquid and gas to evaporate before exposing to an ignition source.  Remember most electrical appliances can cause sparks.  Escaping gas indicates either poor alignment of the filling nozzle or the wrong adaptor has been used or the appliance is already full.  Check for leaking gas before operation.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
Messages: <Messages>      <Message TypeCode="BulkBuyLimit" TriggerQuantity="99" GroupId="NOT_MAPPED" Description="Sorry, there is a limit of 99 on this product">        <Stores all="true" />      </Message>    </Messages>
